form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Freedom of Information Act ( Dependent Support Affidavit, FOIA ( (b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 Page 2 of 2 8. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: Harbhajan Uppal, Wife age 40 FOIA (b)(6) 9. That my expenses include groceries, life insurance premiums, and credit card payments. tinitial Dated: 3-2-88 (Joginder Singh Uppal) Deponent Huppal (Harbha jan Uppal) Deponent Verification: Verified on this 7th day of March 1988, that the contents of this affidavit from paragraphs 1 to 9 are true to the best of my knowledge and belief, and nothing has been concealed herein. Huptal (Joginder Singh Uppal) Deponent Sworn to by the above named persons on this 7th day of March, 1988, before me, a notary public for the County of Kalamazoo and State of Michigan. pas PAUL D. FAZIO Notary Public, Allegan County, Michigan Acting In County, Michigan My Commission Expires December 28, 1991
